entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegEx support for ranges outside of Basic Multilingual Plane #79865
  • Access Violation in Interop+Sys.ChDir #79864
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById() doesn't always return correct UTC time offset #79860
  • [6.0][7.0] MacCatalyst Mono - XcodeBuildApp failed moving directory #79859
  • [6.0] .NET 4.8 queue removed #79858
  • Cannot precompile blazor wasm with RunAOTCompilation set to true inside docker #79857
  • [macOS] cannot debug / stop at breakpoints when app sandbox is enabled #79852
  • IHost.RunAsync() does not exit on CTRL_+C #79851
  • Non-default property setter in class bound with appsettings.json, no longer loading in .NET 7 #79848
  • GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_Arm/project.assets.json already exists #79843
  • Provide a source generator for Stream that emits the boilerplate for most members and enforces using the most-efficient members #79839
    8.0.0
  • MVC Scaffolding and XmlTransforms -- Web.config #79838

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Provide optimized read-only collections for SortedSet and SortedDictionary #79781
  • [mono][interpreter] Fix performance of new span helpers #76326
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Publicly expose `IPartition<TElement>` #79791
  • [API Proposal]: `MemoryStream.GetString(Encoding? encoding)` #79830
  • Test failure: JIT\IL_Conformance\Old\Conformance_Base\ldarg_i\ldarg_i.cmd #79829
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/ldarg_i/ldarg_i.sh #79840
  • [wasm][icu] Locale aliases are not resolved correcly #79815
    8.0.0
  • ConsoleManualTests.ReadKey_KeyChords failures #78467
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79866
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0] Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79862
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid a race condition in restoring the GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_* projects #79861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][threads] save/restore errno in thread state transitions #79856
    area-Threading-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79855
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fixes InvalidCastException when using other attributes #79854
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • createdump: only dump committed memory #79853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add NativeAOT checked leg #79847
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix size regression from enum sorting #79845
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Checked/Release asm diffs #79844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid delegate allocation in generic cycle detector #79842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79669
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][debugger] Fix Debugger.Break() behavior when running on release mode #79822
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79849
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Added a null-check for 2-dim array access #79450
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update manual console tests after recent ReadKey rewrite #79811
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Fix ldarg_i test #79834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove bash dependency from init-compiler #77304
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Switch to the new ARM64 Helix queues #77764
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add sourcegen support for required & init-only properties. #79828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Mono SpanHelpers workaround #79821
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix build for DUMP_GC_TABLES defined in Release #79835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79665
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing is not working #2120
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing Hello World for WebAssembly target on Windows arm64 fails #2121

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Change image for NetCore1ESPool-Internal pool to windows.vs2019.amd64 #2134

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IsInitOnly boolean property for PropertyDefinition in SDK #29616
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With .Net 8 SDK installed in Chinese OS, the texts should not contain “Core” string when building the project. #29615

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix publish test TFMs #29627
    Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2071036 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Verify and Verify.Diffplex #29623
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates

Merged

  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates
  • Add the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces as a reference package to the GenAPI Task project. #29604
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29585
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update params-span.md following LDM 2022-11-30 #6784

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplify initialization of local scope based on `scoped` modifier #66079
    17.5
  • Compiler errors for duplicate modifiers are inconsistent #66077
  • Unnecessary temp for side-effecting elements in deconstruction assignment #66074
  • Visual Basic: "Object initialization can be simplified (IDE0017)" wrong indent with custom tab/indent size #66071
  • Buttons in "Change signature" dialog have low contrast when High Contrast is enabled #66070

Closed

  • Can't access extension methods via base expressions #66080
  • Generic type argument inference fails in the face of implicit cast (e.g. Span<T> to ReadOnlySpan<T>) #66072
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33219.200 #66068
  • Unexpected error for a record primary constructor parameter #66067
  • Selenium WebDriver for .Net 6.0 do`nt starts in C# Interactive #66066
  • Unexpected ref safety error reported with `out _` with C#7.2 ref safety rules #65651
    17.5
  • Ref safety errors reported for deconstruction assignment with discard #65522
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Add unique color scheme for high contrast mode #66082
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers
  • Block `default(delegate*<void>...enum)` in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Only examine a PEReference once when walking projects to produce inheritance tree #66043
    Area-IDE
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Use the inner pattern to recreate the decision DAG for is-expressions #65878
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Security implications of using IHttpContextAccessor in Blazor Server #45699
  • Provide access to parsed route parameters and method body parameters in authorization filters #45698
  • Perf improvement: json #45697
  • Virtualize does not respond to items change after call RefreshDataAsync but when scrolling page #45694
  • OIDC - Setting the proxy to BackchannelHttpHandler does not make all calls pass through the proxy #45688
  • Rate Limiting configuration - policy validation #45684

Closed

  • who know to get abpuser list? #45693
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #45685
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext_netty #45686
  • Blazor Wasm] not updating after new deploy linux #45689
  • Allow modifying certain files post-build without forcing `BlazorCacheBootResources=false` #45687
  • Vulnerability CVE-2006-0300 #45690
  • Blazor change detection improvment #45644
  • If there are children, the parent table cannot be deleted. How to be solved? #45669
  • [Blazor] NanoFramework #45659
  • Using browserlink causes a 500 instead of a 404 response when an exception handling middleware is used #45622
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #45679

PullRequests

Merged

  • [AOT] Fixing the problems with ProblemDetails #45646
    area-web-frameworks

Updated

  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2071081 #45630
    area-mvc
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell flyout items are displayed multiple times - if async added by code #12233
  • ERROR -cannot execute app.dll the selected execution mode is not supported for .net projects #12231
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to change FontFamily #12230
    Backlog
  • Building in Release mode for Android results in a "The selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." error #12226
  • SetPadding for Entry does not work in .NET 7/MAUI 7 in Android #12224
    Backlog
  • NotifyCanExecuteChanged event doesn't set correct button color on Windows #12222
    Backlog
  • CollectionView unusable on iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max #12221
    Backlog

Closed

  • Frame does not render border correctly while corner radius specified on windows platform #11990
  • [xamlc] Try to remove `[LoadInSeparateAppDomain]` #11885
    .NET 8 Planning
  • How to open maui project directly on Maximized window? #12223
  • Building in Release mode for iOS results in a "The application has not been built" error #12225

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] remove Xamarin.AndroidX.Legacy.Support.V4 #12232
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #12155
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [xamlc] remove `LoadInSeparateAppDomain` and `static` state #11982
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.4.0 to 17.4.1 #12169
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add BlazorWebView binaries to xmldocs artifacts #12215
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Add a null-guard in MenuItem to prevent NRE #12207
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    community ✨
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix Frame Renderer to use Wrapper View correctly #12218
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.EntityFrameworkCore NuGet version 7.0.x does not support NET 6.0.x, but the EntityFrameworkCore 7.0.x does support NET 6.0.x. #29903
  • Renaming `PeriodStart` and `PeriodEnd` columns of a temporal table causes them to be swapped #29902
  • Howto update auto-implemented (by convention) many to many in Entity Framework Core 6 (.Net 6)? #29901
  • DBNull shows up as a large negative value -9223372036854774807 automatically triggering DBConcurrencyException for Concurrency tokens #29900
  • TPC and TPH mapping strategies not respecting default database schema during migration #29899

Closed

  • Error with loading the Spatialite extension with v7 of sqlite provider #29833
  • The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit #29790
  • Use HTTPS URL for 1-to-1 foreign key exception #29895
    8.0.0
  • Alpine 3.17 for mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:3.1 docker image #29886

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix HTTP links in messages to use HTTPS #29896
  • Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29876

Updated

  • Identity resolution for loading detached entities #29884

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 8.0 SDK pkg installed on MAC, showing a redundant .NET Runtime #15003

Updated

  • .NET 6 installer fails builds of Azure Function projects on macOS #11951

PullRequests

Created

  • Force /p:PortableBuild=true, for cases where we overrode the RID. #15163
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #15157

Merged

  • Fix branch filters for the VMR synchronization #15161
  • Fix branch filters for the VMR synchronization #15160
  • Fix branch filters for the VMR synchronization #15158
  • Fix branch filters for the VMR synchronization #15156
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #15154
  • .NET Source-Build 6.0.112 December 2022 Updates #15127
